ShowMessages.label: Print all your welcome messages in the log
ShowMessages.tooltip: Deletes the viewer, which has the same name as you typed in the textbox above. Don't forget to press 'Save Settings' after enter a name and before pressing this button!

SendMessages.label: Send welcome messages
SendMessages.tooltip: If not enabled the bot dosen't send any messages if a viewer joins.

DeleteMessage.label: Remove Messages by ID:
DeleteMessage.tooltip:
Type in the ID of the message you want to be removed. Then press the 'Save Settings' button and the message gets removed! '0' to remove no message.
DON'T FORGET TO SET THIS BACK TO 0 WHEN YOU ARE FINISHED!

AddMessage.label: New welcome message:
AddMessage.tooltip:
Write your new welcome message in here and press 'Save Settings'. Available parameters: {viewer} - The viewer who joined the stream.

PROTIP: /w {viewer} MESSAGE - To whisper a message to the viewer!

ViewerToDelete.label: Name of viewer:
ViewerToDelete.tooltip: Don't forget to press the 'Save Settings' button after typing in the name BEFORE pressing the 'Delete Viewer' button!

DeleteSingle.label: Delete Viewer
DeleteSingle.tooltip: Deletes the viewer, which has the same name as you typed in the textbox above. Don't forget to press 'Save Settings' after enter a name and before pressing this button!

SafeQuestion.label: Activate this function (don't forget to press 'Save Settings')
SafeQuestion.tooltip: To remove all viewers from your list you have to check this checkbox, press the button 'Save Settings' and THEN press the button 'Delete all viewers'. The viewer are then gone... FOREVER!

Delete.label: Delete ALL Viewers
Delete.tooltip: WARNING! Viewers are gone FOREVER after you pressed the button!

Show.label: Print all viewers in the log
Show.tooltip: Simple! It prints every viewer with their join-date in the log of the chatbot!
